DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_03_01: Please, help me! That leering character won't leave me alone! He follows me, stands by the window all day long, sings serenades, you can go crazy!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_03_02: But my beautiful swan, what demon has entered you that it has begun to bother you?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_03_03: None! I'm just sick of it! I'm not marrying you and that's it!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_15_04: Slowly. As a result of this... harassment, did you suffer any damage?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_03_04: I never even touched her! I use sophisticated methods, not shoving my hands around like some primitive! Who do you think I am?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_15_01: Playing serenades under the window is not a crime, so the matter is between you. Please do not involve the guard in this.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_03_02: Excuse me? I'll report this to your superior!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_15_03: At what time did he play?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_15_05: In that case, that wasn't even a breach of the quiet hours. Please, disperse.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_03_06: You see, my eagle? You shouldn't take my advances as a bad thing! Let's go to a tavern, drink some good wine, talk about the superiority of Archolos culture over Khorinis culture...
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_03_07: No, thank you! I'd rather sleep in peace!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_15_01: You will be reprimanded by me. There was no violation, but you should change your behavior.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_03_02: Change? Does officer know what it's like to pine for the sight of the woman you love? What it's like to suffocate through the lack of any look from her?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_03_03: I bought the best clothes, lute and perfume for myself to make a good impression, and in gratitude, I meet only an indestructible wall of resentment!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_15_06: If you bought something for the object of your affection, you'd probably get a better result. Anyway, I'm not going to waste any more time here. Goodbye.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_03_07: Of course! Why would you be interested in us? This misunderstanding has no legal basis!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_BadGuy_03_09: Eh... are you sure that you can't give him a fine of some kind so he doesn't have money for further excesses?
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Sure_15_03: I'm thinking that this kind of solicitation would fall under section 34, paragraph... em, two!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Sure_15_04: The penalty for breaking it is a fine of... 50 gold pieces.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Sure_03_05: Excuse me? It's a rip-off! I will not be exploited like this! I'll report you to your superior!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Sure_15_06: You have to go to him anyway. There's a week to pay off the fine.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Sure_15_07: I'm glad that's all clear. Now please disperse.
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_No_03_02: This law of ours sucks! It doesn't protect innocent women at all, but always their oppressors! Someday, I'm gonna do something about it!
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_No_03_03: Let me help you! We can go through the regulations together, pick out the worst ones...
DIA_FMQ003Citizen_Hello_Goodbye_Choice: In that case, no crime took place.
